variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

dependencies.name: pkgconfig
dependencies.description:
pkgconf is a program which helps to configure compiler and linker flags
for development frameworks. It is similar to pkg-config from
freedesktop.org, providing additional functionality while also
maintaining compatibility.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-poetry
dependencies.description: Python dependency management and packaging made easy.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: python-venv
dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment

dependent_to.name: py-pyprecice
dependent_to.description:
This package provides python language bindings for the C++ library
preCICE.

dependent_to.name: fenics
dependent_to.description:
FEniCS is organized as a collection of interoperable components that
together form the FEniCS Project. These components include the problem-
solving environment DOLFIN, the form compiler FFC, the finite element
tabulator FIAT, the just-in-time compiler Instant / Dijitso, the code
generation interface UFC, the form language UFL and a range of
additional components.

dependent_to.name: py-healpy
dependent_to.description: healpy is a Python package to handle pixelated data on the sphere.

dependent_to.name: py-amici
dependent_to.description: Advanced Multilanguage Interface for CVODES and IDAS

dependent_to.name: py-h5py
dependent_to.description:
The h5py package provides both a high- and low-level interface to the
HDF5 library from Python.
